page.title: 11EDUCATION:PRIMARY Cont
page.content: On leaving the First School for the Middle,pupils take Diagnostic tests: National Foundation for Educational Research,Standardised tests in non- verbal reasoning,English Progress, Maths Attainment and Reading. 3 children come to school by taxi,the others all travel from Brumstead and within Stalham under their own arrangements.They do not have any home work only a little number or reading work. They are taken on school trips,but only if they are beneficial and educational. The school does a lot of fund-raising. Last year,Â£1000 was raised by the saving of waste paper.This went to the National Children's Homes. The children enjoy attending and look forward to their Middle School transfer and more facilities.
